summary: The customer contacted Contoso Wireless to downgrade their internet service. The agent provided information on the basic plan, which costs $49.99 per month and includes speeds up to 25 Mbps download and 5 Mbps upload, unlimited data, free access to Contoso Wireless’s Wi-Fi hotspots nationwide, and 24/7 customer service line. The new service will be activated within 24-48 hours of the order being placed. The customer thanked the agent for their help and the agent wished them a great day.
